intro: Schizoglossum tenellum, commonly known as the narrow-leafed daisy, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its slender, grass-like leaves and small, daisy-like yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and thrives in full sun. It is often found in coastal areas and is adapted to arid environments. Schizoglossum tenellum is a perennial plant that produces seeds in its second year of growth.
